name: monorepo-manager
title: Manage Monorepo Projects/Workspaces
description: A Raycast extension helps to manage monorepo projects/workspaces in your machine. It also list all packages in each monorepo project/workspace
author: tung-dang

preferences.name: rootSourceFolder
preferences.title: Root Source Folder Path
preferences.description: A absolute folder path contains all workspaces/projects

preferences.name: slackRedirectLink
preferences.title: Slack Channel Redirection Link
preferences.description: A Slack link is used to redirect to a specific channel, which is gotten from package information

preferences.name: mainFieldName
preferences.title: Field in `package.json` File Containing Detail of a Package
preferences.description: If the field name is not specified, some detail info of current package will be omitted
